attributes.action: Take action to provide greater access to abortion services in Northern Ireland
attributes.additional_details:
Link to an article in The Guardian from May 2022 on the matter:
https://www.theguardian.com/world/2022/may/04/abortion-services-in-northern-ireland-almost-nonexistent-despite-legalisation
attributes.background: Abortion services in Northern Ireland are almost non-existent, despite abortion being legalised there in 2020. This is unacceptable. Abortions are healthcare. Access to abortions are vital to preserve bodily autonomy and bodily sovereignty.
